(This is in part an excuse to test the posting workflow after switching the 
website to the Quarto framework)

Let $A$ be a 2x2 real matrix and let:

$$
\lambda _{\pm} = \frac{\text {Tr}A}{2}\pm 

\sqrt{\left( \frac{\text {Tr}A}{2} \right )^2-\det A}
$$ {#eq-eigenvalues}

be its eigenvalues.
